7c14218d-3a7d-4399-9dc6-82ac5fb30188.name: 脆弱眼部
7c14218d-3a7d-4399-9dc6-82ac5fb30188.notes: 对手在其视线范围内对你的眼部进行攻击时只受到 -6 命中惩罚

5e9abddb-6eea-4958-a85c-492ee7cca806.name: 硬皮
5e9abddb-6eea-4958-a85c-492ee7cca806.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

354f060a-58f3-4af3-8449-dc803c0b9f05.name: 高痛阈
354f060a-58f3-4af3-8449-dc803c0b9f05.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

acbb0a04-a31f-4a6d-9506-16c4c11c2276.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 25 倍

46bd411b-005d-479f-87b4-19bc31316102.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 50 倍

cfa7e71f-b260-434d-b87b-3cf469b477b1.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 200 倍

0e14b39e-a6ae-432e-8f15-7c23c487d0c5.name: 增强时间感
0e14b39e-a6ae-432e-8f15-7c23c487d0c5.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

3ae7e811-b0f9-4f5e-9680-cc3647561ab5.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

e0949f15-bcee-4c95-adc7-5b31546798c7.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points
